content: single_crochet ch2-space treble_crochet work dtri in ch2-space of tt ch2 through last tt treble_crochet ch1 3 times treble_crochet around tch 4tr at ends of row dtri-in-dtri = skip chain-space before dtri and 1st double_crochet of dtri work double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in ch2-space of dtri skip 2nd double_crochet of dtri and chain-space after dtri feather-over-feather = there are 8 treble_crochet and 7 ch1-space skip all the trs and work in ch1-sps as follows skip 1st ch1-space work treble_crochet in 2nd ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet in 3rd ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet ch1 4 times in 4th ch1-space treble_crochet in 5th ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet in 6th ch1-space skip 7th ch1-space treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 9 of 13 row 2 ch7 turn work treble_crochet ch1 2 times treble_crochet in 1st ch1-space work ch1 skip treble_crochet treble_crochet in next ch1-space 1 time skip last treble_crochet ch1-space treble_crochet of stitch group ch2 dtri-in-dtri ch2 feather-over-feather ch2 dtri-in-dtri ch2 through last dtri skip 1st treble_crochet 1st ch1-space 2nd treble_crochet of end group work treble_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 skip treble_crochet 1 time then work treble_crochet ch1 3 times treble_crochet around tch 5tr at ends the next row will increase at the underlined chain-space and add a treble_crochet ch1 to each end group row 3 ch7 turn work treble_crochet ch1 2 times treble_crochet in 1st ch1-space work ch1 skip next treble_crochet treble_crochet in next ch1-space 2 times skip last treble_crochet ch1-space treble_crochet of stitch group ch3 dtri-in-dtri ch3 feather-over-feather ch3 dtri-in- dtri ch3 through last dtri skip 1st treble_crochet 1st ch1-space 2nd treble_crochet of end group work treble_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 skip next treble_crochet 2 times then work treble_crochet ch1 3 times treble_crochet around tch 6tr at ends row 4 ch7 turn work treble_crochet ch1 2 times treble_crochet in 1st ch1-space work ch1 skip next treble_crochet treble_crochet in next ch1-space 3 times skip last treble_crochet ch1-space treble_crochet of stitch group ch4 dtri-in-dtri ch4 feather-over-feather ch4 dtri-in- dtri ch4 through last dtri skip 1st treble_crochet 1st ch1-space 2nd treble_crochet of end group work treble_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 skip next treble_crochet 3 times then work treble_crochet ch1 3 times treble_crochet around tch 7tr at ends final row does same increasing and also gives feathers a picot at the center picot = ch5 slip_stitch in 5th chain from hook feather-with-picot-over-feather = there are 8 treble_crochet and 7 ch1-space skip all the treble_crochet and work in ch1-space as follows skip 1st ch1-space work treble_crochet in 2nd ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet in 3rd ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet ch1 treble_crochet picot treble_crochet ch1 treble_crochet in 4th ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet in 5th ch1-space ch1 treble_crochet in 6th ch1-space skip 7th ch1-space row 5 ch7 turn work treble_crochet ch1 2 times treble_crochet in 1st ch1-space picot skip next treble_crochet work treble_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 3 times skip next treble_crochet treble_crochet in next ch1-space skip last treble_crochet ch1-space treble_crochet of stitch group ch5 dtri-in-dtri ch5 feather- with-picot-over-feather ch5 dtri-in-dtri ch5 through last dtri skip 1st treble_crochet 1st ch1-space 2nd treble_crochet of end group
